GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 03-41N 006-46E AT 290755Z APR.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS
   POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO MDAT-GOGC, PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 060840Z MAY 17.
